stlib.datatypes.spatial

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • stlib.datatypes.GeneralType
      • stlib.datatypes.spatial.Line
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Spatial, GeneralTypeIF, LineIF
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cycle

    public class Line
extends GeneralType
implements LineIF
    This class represents spatial objects of type 'Line'
    Author:
    Markus Fuessel
